sentences.en: A series of movies will be shown to commemorate the 30th anniversary of his death.
sentences.cn: 为纪念他逝世30周年，有一系列的电影要上映。

sentences.en: The Duanwu Festival, also called the Dragon Boat Festival, is to commemorate the patriotic poet Qu Yuan.
sentences.cn: 端午节，又叫龙舟节，是为了纪念爱国诗人屈原。

sentences.en: We've already looked at portrait sculpture which are busts created to commemorate people who had died, and we've looked at relief sculpture, or sculpting on walls.
sentences.cn: 我们已经看过了肖像雕塑，即为纪念逝者而作的半身像，我们也看过了浮雕，或者说墙上的雕刻。
